Pre-Game Insights: USA have shown the ability to keep India on the leash for the majority of the run chase on Wednesday, indicating a strong performance.
The two nations squared off against each other at the same venue in December 2021 and shared the honours one all in a 2 match T20I series.
USA sent shockwaves with a 26-run win over full members Ireland more than 2 years back, and now start as favourites.

The track in Fort Lauderdale has been a batsman's paradise in its short international history but will be under covers for more than 72 hours leading up to the game, expecting a soft and damp surface for the game in addition to overcast conditions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Greater Miami area found itself swamped with as much as 10-12 inches of rain in certain neighbourhoods, fostering US fans to morbidly hope for the game to wash out.
Andrew Balbirnie, Ireland's man for all seasons, has endured a torrid run in his last 5 outings for Ireland but would be itching to make a mark at the world stage.
Others: The game is scheduled for 14 June 2024 at 10:30 AM local time, 14:30 GMT, and 8 PM IST.

Paul Stirling (captain), Andrew Balbirnie, Lorcan Tucker (wk), Harry Tector, Curtis Campher, George Dockrell, Benjamin White, Josh Little, Mark Adair, Gareth Delany, Barry McCarthy are expected to play for Ireland.

Monank Patel (captain), Steven Taylor, Andries Gous, Aaron Jones (vice captain), Corey Anderson, Nitish Kumar, Jasdeep Singh, Harmeet Singh, Shadley Van Schalkwyk, Saurabh Netravalkar, Ali Khan are expected to play for USA.
